metadata.title: CVE-2012-5881 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Flash componentinfrastructure in YUI 2.4.0 through 2.9.0 allows remote attackers to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via vectors related to charts.swf, a similarissue to CVE-2010-4207.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5881` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-yui - 2.9.0.dfsg.0.1-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yui package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.0.dfsg.0.1-0.1').
